title: List of observers to the European Parliament for Lithuania, 2003–2004
text: This is a list of the 13 observers to the <a href="European%20Parliament">European Parliament</a> for <a href="Lithuania">Lithuania</a> in the <a href="5th%20European%20Parliament">1999 to 2004 session</a>. They were appointed by the <a href="Parliament%20of%20Lithuania">Lithuanian Parliament</a> as observers from 1 May 2003 until the <a href="Accession%20of%20Lithuania%20to%20the%20European%20Union">accession of Lithuania to the EU</a> on 1 May 2004.
